thread.title: Everyone headed back to the 1990s with the return of TFI Friday
thread.title_full: Everyone headed back to the 1990s with the return of TFI Friday

title: Everyone headed back to the 1990s with the return of TFI Friday
text:
Everyone headed back to the 1990s with the return of TFI Friday Everyone headed back to the 1990s with the return of TFI Friday 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
TFI Friday is back on our screens with presenter Chris Evans acting as ringmaster over the interviews, performances and wacky stunts ‚Äì three people went down an improvised water slide even before the first ad break. 
But mostly people were just happy to have a dollop of retro 90s added to their TV schedule. 
It was getting people reminiscing about life when they used to watch the Channel 4 show, and some of the line-up could have come straight from the original run of shows with U2 and Take That performing. Watching TFI Friday.Mum‚Äôs and Dad‚Äôs reminiscing all over the country while the kids say ‚ÄúWTF is this‚ÄùüòÇ 
‚Äî Stan Collymore (@StanCollymore) October 16, 2015 #TFIFriday 1996 ‚Äì preamble to night out on the sauce. TFI Friday 2015 ‚Äì on sofa in PJ's with a curry. #embraceoldage 
‚Äî James Parton (@jamesparton) October 16, 2015 Take That and TFI Friday, 2 of my favourite things from the 90s! #takethat #TFIFriday 
‚Äî jackie fox (@jaxxtrueblue) October 16, 2015 TFI Friday on Channel 4. Feels like its never been away 
‚Äî Jerome O'Hare (@hare191) October 16, 2015 #TFI Friday is back! Takes me back almost 15 years 
‚Äî Ryan J Owens (@Foxinthebox1) October 16, 2015 
But people were left with two very important questions. 
Firstly, where were show regulars Texas and two, will TFI‚Äôs unique brand of TV mayhem make the cut with the millennials? TFI has been on 10 minutes already yet I still haven't seen Texas perform. Bastard. Wonder if the new generation will get TFI channel 4. Share article 
‚Äî jo st mart (@jstmart66) October 16, 2015 Promoted Stories
